snippet: Greece's economy contracted from October to December after two straight quarters of growth, statistics service (ELSTAT) said on Monday, with its performance in the last quarter of 2016 turning out worse than projected in February....

headline.main: Greek Economy Slumps in Fourth Quarter, Hurt by Net Exports
headline.print_headline: Greek Economy Slumps in Fourth Quarter, Hurt by Net Exports

lead_paragraph: Greece's economy contracted from October to December after two straight quarters of growth, statistics service (ELSTAT) said on Monday, with its performance in the last quarter of 2016 turning out worse than projected in February.
